text:
Hi
We are migrating our HubSpot entire site from an old HubSpot Visual Builder template (from 2016) to a new HubSpot DnD (drag-and-drop) based parent/child theme (Minimal Pro by Transfunnel).  Mostly, we just want to apply the new Global Header & Global Footer, but this is not automatically applied when selecting the new template on each page.  Each page would need to have the header & footer manually dragged in on a page by page basis - a total pain.
My question is (surely there must be a way):  is there a script or something that can be run to apply the new global header & footer to all pages in one go?  Any advice would be appreciated.
Thanks,
Riki
I'm not familiar with the theme or how it is coded, but have you confirmed with their support that is how it is intended to work?
Yes, I have confirmed.  The problem has to do with how the Global Header/Footer was included in 2016 vs now.
